name: Java in memory JNDI context
short_description: Java JNDI 1.1 naming context. JNDI is not just for J2EE, with this package you can use it with any Java application. This context resides completely in memory, is configurable from xml, and capable of storing any Java object. Requires java 1.4 or higher.
